channel.title: 639 - Spawn Item to Bank [ Code Error ]

item.title: 639 - Spawn Item to Bank [ Code Error ]
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

Ok we all know the ::item command, where you spawn an item (ex: ::item 995 21470000000 for max cash) some players may know it more as the ::pickup command, ::spawn, etc. Anyways, I am trying to do the same thing except for in your bank. I already have the command to spawn something in your inventory, but I am trying to make a new command that will spawn the item in your bank instead.

If you have any ideas on a new code / how to fix this one please let me know!!

First off here’s my code in commands.java

[code] if (command[0].equals(“itemb”)) {

		if (command.length == 3) {
			player.getInventory().getContainer().addItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]),
					Integer.parseInt(command[2]));
		} else {
			player.getInventory().getContainer().addItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), 1);
		}
		player.getBank().refresh();
	}[/code]

and here’s my error I receive upon compiling.

src\org\dementhium\content\Commands.java:871: error: cannot find symbol player.getInventory().getContainer().addItem(Int eger.parseInt(command[1]), ^ symbol: method addItem(int,int) location: class Container src\org\dementhium\content\Commands.java:874: error: cannot find symbol player.getInventory().getContainer().addItem(Int eger.parseInt(command[1]), 1); ^ symbol: method addItem(int,int) location: class Container 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Any and all help is GREATLY appreciated ;D

Read full topic
